import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import jobs from './jobs'; import Nav from '../../Components/molecules/nav_footer/Nav'; import Footer from '../../Components/molecules/nav_footer/Footer'; import defaultImg from '../../assets/default.png'; const JobDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const job = jobs.find((job) => job.id === +id); console.log(job); return ( <>
<>

{job.title}

{job.company}

{job.location}

{job.site}

Job posted:{' '} {job.date}

About:

{job.description}

Requirements:

    {job.requirements?.map((requirement) => (
  • {requirement}
    • ))}

Responsibilities:

  • Develop new features and enhancements to existing applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Identify opportunities for process improvements and automation.
  • Write well-designed, testable, efficient code.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary
  • Flexible working hours
  • Remote work
Apply
); }; export default JobDetails;
